title: Tonari no Oneesan (Girl Next Door)
synopsis: Could YOU hold out? Haunted by the memory of his ideal woman, Masahiko is determined not to lose his virginity until he finds her again. Too bad his memory sucks and he can't remember who she is.
characters: ['Mitarai, Masahiko', 'Saeki, Kyoko', 'Fukuda, Yuya', 'Kusamura, Mitsuko', 'Tsutsuse, Aoi', 'Hanako', 'Saeki, Asuka', 'Mikoto, Rei', 'Sha, Fong Lee', 'Mitarai, Masakado']
staff: [['Omata, Shinichi', ['Producer']], ['Murakami, Teruaki', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Key Animation', ' Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Yoshida, Tomohiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Happoubi, Jin', ['Original Character Design']]]
